mods.abstract: Female baby, modern English doll, plastic head and all body, brown curly wig, blue sleeping eyes, molded and painted mouth, swivel neck, jointed at shoulders and hips, white bonnet with string, same fabric underwear, lace trimmed dress, gathered at high waist and sleeves, white plastic shoes with socks, embossed on bottom of shoes, 'CINDERELLA No 0 British made'. Accompanying information describes that this doll was brought to the united States from London in 1958, doll, manufactured, dress is machine made, arms are separated from body, need to be mended.""
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
